features.name: Authentication & Profiles
features.description: Email+password authentication via Supabase Auth; user profile stored in public.users with role-based access via RLS.

features.name: Listings
features.description: Farmers create/update/delete crop listings; public read; farmer-only write enforced by RLS.

features.name: Offers & Negotiation
features.description: Buyers place offers on listings; farmers can counter; accepting offer creates an order.

features.name: Orders & Payment Status
features.description: Orders are created from accepted offers and track status and payment status; RLS allows involved parties access.

features.name: Transport Requests & Bids
features.description: Buyer/Farmer creates transport request; transporters bid; assignment updates request and order.

features.name: Messaging
features.description: In-app messages stored in public.messages; send/read allowed only for involved users via RLS.
